core/agents.title: Agents
core/agents.description: The Agent is the central component of Niflheim-X. It orchestrates conversations, manages memory, executes tools, and provides a unified interface for AI interactions.

core/llms.title: LLM Providers
core/llms.description: LLM Providers are the backbone of Niflheim-X, enabling integration with various language models from different vendors. The framework supports a unified interface for multiple providers.

core/memory.title: Memory Systems
core/memory.description: Memory is crucial for creating conversational AI that maintains context across interactions. Niflheim-X provides flexible memory backends for different use cases.

core/tools.title: Tools
core/tools.description: Tools extend agent capabilities by providing access to external systems, APIs, and functions. They enable agents to perform actions beyond text generation.

enterprise/observability.title: Observability
enterprise/observability.description: Enterprise-grade observability for monitoring, debugging, and optimizing AI agent performance in production environments.

examples/simple-qa-bot.title: Simple Q&A Bot
examples/simple-qa-bot.description: Build a sophisticated question-answering bot with conversation memory, web search capabilities, and intelligent response routing.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Get up and running with Niflheim-X in just a few minutes! This guide will walk you through installation, basic setup, and your first AI agent.

guides/quick-start.title: Quick Start Guide
guides/quick-start.description: Get up and running with Niflheim-X in under 5 minutes. This guide will walk you through installation, basic setup, and your first AI agent.

intro.title: Introduction to Niflheim-X
intro.description: Niflheim-X is the next-generation AI agent framework designed for enterprise applications. Built with performance, type safety, and developer experience in mind.
